org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term

Class HingeLossTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.ADMMObjectiveTerm
      • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.HyperplaneTerm
        • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.HingeLossTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReasonerTerm

    public class HingeLossTerm
extends HyperplaneTerm
    ADMMReasoner objective term of the form
    weight * max(coefficients^T * x - constant, 0) All coefficients must be non-zero.

    • Field Summary

      void minimize(float stepSize, float[] consensusValues)
      Updates x to the solution of
      argmin f(x) + stepSize / 2 * \|x - z + y / stepSize \|_2^2
      for the objective term f(x)
